summary: Forced for some time to be a fighting slave, a pagan warrior escapes his captors with a boy and joins a group of Crusaders on their quest to the Holy Land.
cast: Mads Mikkelsen|Alexander Morton|Stewart Porter|Maarten Stevenson|Matthew Zajac|Gordon Brown|Gary McCormack|Andrew Flanagan|James Ramsey|Gary Lewis|Jamie Sives|Ewan Stewart|Rony Bridges|Robert Harrison|Andy Nicolson|Douglas Russell|Garry Sweeney|Tashi Tsering|Lhasam Gedun|Palden Tsering|Pasang Manor|Wangdu Dorjee|Dawa Norbu|Lhabhum Sershi|Tsultrim Gyatso|Tsewang Phuntsok|Tsering Dorjee|Lobsang Griffiths-Golba|Pasang Dorjee|Tenzin Jigdal|Phurbu Rinzin|Lobsang Palden|Jamyang Chophel|Nagwang Kunchok|Tashi Dhondup|Nawang Anja-Tsang|Tashi Sangpo Murik|James Embree|P.B. McBeath|Ally McClelland|Callum Mitchell|Jules Wallace
title: Valhalla Rising
